column2: Electrameccanica Vehicles Corp. engages in development and manufacture of electric vehicles. The company is headquartered in Vancouver, British Columbia. The firm is dedicated to the design and manufacture of electric vehicles. The firm operates in two reportable business segments in Canada, Electric Vehicles and Custom build vehicles. Electric Vehicles segment includes development and manufacture of electric vehicles for mass markets. Custom build vehicles segment includes development and manufacture of high-end custom built vehicles. The firm has designed and built all-electric SOLO, a single-seater electric vehicle. The company has also designed the Tofino, electric two seater roadster set.
